summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Survey360 Pricing Model - all 20 backend API tests passed (100%) and frontend pricing page fully functional after fixing 401 redirect issue

minor.issue: Returns 400 instead of 401 when no auth header provided (semantic inconsistency)

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/survey360/pricing/plans - returns all 5 pricing tiers (Free, Starter, Pro, Business, Enterprise)
Backend: Free plan pricing - $0
Backend: Starter plan pricing - $19/mo, 33% annual discount
Backend: Pro plan pricing - $49/mo, marked as popular
Backend: Business plan pricing - $99/mo
Backend: Enterprise plan - custom pricing
Backend: All paid plans have 33% annual discount
Backend: GET /api/survey360/pricing/trial-info - returns 14-day Pro trial (no credit card)
Backend: Trial info includes Pro features with AI Assistant
Backend: GET /api/survey360/pricing/compare - returns feature comparison matrix
Backend: AI Assistant gated to Pro+ plans (Free/Starter disabled)
Backend: GET /api/survey360/pricing/subscription - requires auth (401)
Backend: GET /api/survey360/pricing/subscription - returns subscription status with auth
Backend: GET /api/survey360/pricing/usage - requires auth (401)
Backend: GET /api/survey360/pricing/usage - returns usage details with auth
Backend: POST /api/survey360/pricing/start-trial - requires auth
Backend: POST /api/survey360/pricing/start-trial - starts 14-day trial
Backend: Free plan features verified (1 user, 100 responses, 3 surveys)
Backend: Pro plan features verified (10 users, 10K responses, AI Assistant)
Backend: Enterprise plan has unlimited resources
Frontend: Pricing page loads correctly at /solutions/survey360/pricing (public)
Frontend: All 5 pricing tiers displayed
Frontend: Monthly/Annual toggle switches prices correctly
Frontend: Annual billing shows correct prices ($12.66, $32.66, $66/mo)
Frontend: Monthly billing shows correct prices ($19, $49, $99/mo)
Frontend: 'Save 33%' badge visible for annual billing
Frontend: Pro plan marked as 'Most Popular'
Frontend: 14-day trial banner displayed
Frontend: FAQ accordion works (expand/collapse)
Frontend: Feature comparison table displays correctly
Frontend: AI Assistant marked as X for Free/Starter, âœ“ for Pro+
Frontend: Contact Sales section present
critical_code_review_comments: Pricing configuration is well-structured with clear profit margin calculations
Good separation of concerns in pricing_routes.py
Feature comparison matrix correctly reflects disabled features per plan
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pricing model fully implemented and tested. The pricing page is at /solutions/survey360/pricing (public route). Fixed 401 redirect issue in survey360Api.js - public pages like /pricing, /demo, /help no longer redirect on 401 errors. Payment integration (Stripe) is NOT implemented - upgrade endpoints work but don't process payments.

bug_fix_applied.issue: Public pricing page was redirecting to login on 401 errors
bug_fix_applied.fix: Added check in response interceptor to skip redirect for public pages (pricing, demo, help)

pricing_model_summary.trial: 14-day Pro trial, no credit card required
